amendment.description: To reduce by $36,000,000 the amount appropriated for "Military Construction, Army", with the amount of the reduction to be allocated to funds available under that heading for the Camp 6 Detention Facility at Guantanamo Bay, Cuba.

action.text: Amendment SA 367 proposed by Senator Byrd.

vote.text: Amendment SA 367 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay. 27 - 71. Record Vote Number: 93.
